title: Tiger Woods, Phil Mickelson, Arnold Palmer as junior golfers
headline: Tour Pros Before They Were Stars
description: Check out vintage shots of Rickie Fowler and Rory McIlroy at the Walker Cup, Phil Mickelson and Ernie Els,  John Daly and Tiger Woods, and impossibly young Sergio Garcia and Michelle Wie in our 'Before They Were Stars' photo gallery.
